mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction_deal_redis_tab (orderNo, paymentType, currencyId, transactionPrice, currencyNumber, currencyTotalPrice, addTime) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{paymentType}, #{currencyId}, #{transactionPrice}, #{currencyNumber}, #{currencyTotalPrice}, #{addTime})

INSERT INTO transaction_deal_redis_tab (orderNo, paymentType, currencyId, transactionPrice, currencyNumber, currencyTotalPrice, addTime) VALUES
(#{item.orderNo}, #{item.paymentType}, #{item.currencyId}, #{item.transactionPrice}, #{item.currencyNumber}, #{item.currencyTotalPrice}, #{item.addTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, orderNo, paymentType, currencyId, transactionPrice, currencyNumber, currencyTotalPrice, addTime FROM transaction_deal_redis_tab WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo} ORDER BY addTime DESC, id DESC

SELECT transactionPrice FROM transaction_deal_redis_tab WHERE currencyId = #{currencyId} AND orderNo LIKE CONCAT(#{orderNoPrefix}, '%') AND addTime <= #{addTime} ORDER BY addTime DESC, id DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT currencyId, SUM(currencyNumber) totalNumber, SUM(currencyNumber * transactionPrice) totalPrice FROM transaction_deal_redis_tab WHERE orderNo LIKE CONCAT(#{orderNoPrefix}, '%') AND addTime > #{date} AND addTime <= #{endDate} GROUP BY currencyId
SELECT addTime FROM transaction_deal_redis_tab WHERE currencyId = #{currencyId} AND orderNo LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%') ORDER BY addTime ASC LIMIT 1
